title: Marketing Bundle Deal Overview Daily Report
description: Daily overview report for a marketing bundle deal

Bundle_ID.description: The unique identifier for the bundle deal

Bundle_Name.description: The name of the marketing bundle deal

Period.description: The time period during which the report is generated (format: DD-MM-YYYY HH:mm - DD-MM-YYYY HH:mm)

Units_Sold.description: Total units of the bundle deal sold

Orders.description: Total number of orders for the bundle deal

Buyers.description: Total number of unique buyers for the bundle deal

Sales.description: Total sales with amount and currency

Sales_Per_Buyer.description: Sales per buyer with amount and currency

Bundle_Deals_Ordered.description: Total number of times the bundle deal was ordered

Status.description: Current status of the bundle deal (e.g., 'Expired')
